column4: Hi guys, I have a problem with my ssh-server I've set up on my Ubuntu 10.10 server. When ever I reboot the server I have to log on locally with my keyboard plugged into the server instead of just controlling it as usual through PuTTy. When I've logged on to it locally, it works just fine with the RSA-certificate again
